item.title: BRS Holds Preparatory Meeting Ahead of Local Body Elections in Gadwal â€“ Basu Hanumanthu Naidu Asserts People Will Support BRS
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A crucial preparatory meeting of key Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) party workers was held at the district BRS office in Gadwal town on Thursday in anticipation of the upcoming local body elections. The session was presided over by Gadwal constituency BRS in-charge Basu Hanumanthu Naidu, who strongly asserted that people would unequivocally stand by the BRS in the forthcoming elections.
Addressing the gathering, Hanumanthu Naidu launched a scathing attack on the Congress-led state governm...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
